relation: There are plenty of activites that the student organizations for the students that are there.
At the university there are plenty of choices that the students can chose from. In the dining hall we have a hot fresh bar, vegetarian bar and a salad bar.
Everyone is very close with one another in the dorms. The RA's keep everyone informed with campus activities or anything else.
The students of ONU are very rigorous about academics. ONU is rated excellent for there acadmemics.
Get to know your professors they will help you with whatever you need. Join extracurricular activities so you get to know your fellow ONU students.

This university is one of the top private universities in the nation. Even though the location is in a small town called Ada, the community and university work as one to support one another. It is also the home of the Wilson Football Factory.
pageTitle: Ohio Northern University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students ONU is great for students who are looking for personalized education and a tight-knit campus community. The university has top-ranking pharmacy, engineering, and business colleges. There are also many unique degree programs, such as a 6-year Pharm D, Pharmaceutical Business, Forensic Accounting, and Forensic Biology. Tips for prospective students Get involved as soon as you reach campus! Ada is a small community, but once you meet friends and participate in campus organizations, you will forget that you are surrounded by corn fields! Bang for the buck It can't be denied that ONU is an expensive private school, but don't let that discourage you! Financial Aid is readily available and the quality degree programs are well-worth the investment. Am enjoying being here Students, faculty, and staff at ONU are warm and welcoming from the moment you step foot on campus. No matter where you go, you will be greeted with a smile and a helping hand. The small school atmosphere makes it hard to not enjoy your time here...you are sure to run into a friend around every corner! Am learning a lot
